price: 55.Malayka Ibraahimow nummah asmatleemiy raq sinnil koo ayti kumusnak, toysa atu nanu koo elle aytikumusnaamak yabboode marih num makkin kaak itte.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū basharnāka bil-ḥaqi falā takun mina al-qāniṭīna
